alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Natrona County through 415 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Teapot Rock to 7 miles northwest of Antelope Hills. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Antelope Hills around 400 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Homa Hills. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 196 and 213. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
